title: Crustless vegetarian quiche
ingredients: ['2 teaspoons rapeseed oil', '100g mushrooms, washed and sliced', '170g courgette, cut into thin slices', '150g green peppers, cubed', '1 onion, finely chopped', '1 clove of garlic, finely chopped', '450g low fat ricotta or cottage cheese', '4-5 eggs', '200g frozen spinach, thawed, drained and squeezed dry', '125g feta cheese, crumbled', '1 tablespoon fresh parsley, finely chopped', '1 1/2 tablespoons fresh thyme, finely chopped', 'salt and pepper to taste', '2 medium-sized tomatoes, seeds removed and diced finely']
